channel.title: Comments on: Site is no more after they discover they did not have SQL Server backups
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: OracleDave , it looks like they are selling the URL since they don't need it anymore after they lost all the data
item.content:encoded: OracleDave , it looks like they are selling the URL since they don’t need it anymore after they lost all the data

item.title: By: OracleDave
item.dc:creator: OracleDave
item.description: So was the company folding anyway?? Why would they sell the URL unless they were going under anyway?? What's the full story here?
item.content:encoded: So was the company folding anyway?? Why would they sell the URL unless they were going under anyway?? What’s the full story here?

item.title: By: Video Security Services of Nashville
item.dc:creator: Video Security Services of Nashville
item.description: Those who talk the talk tend not able to walk the walk!
item.content:encoded: Those who talk the talk tend not able to walk the walk!

item.title: By: Claude
item.dc:creator: Claude
item.description: Word of the day: *inscrutibly* - a crazy of way of saying incredibly.
item.content:encoded: Word of the day: *inscrutibly* – a crazy of way of saying incredibly.
